sites_order <- c ("Heikkisenjoki_Background_C", "Heikkisenjoki_Background_R","Heikkisenjoki_Recovery_C", "Heikkisenjoki_Recovery_R", "Heikkisenjoki_Contemporary_C", "Heikkisenjoki_Contemporary_R", "KALL_Background_C", "KALL_Background_R", "KALL_Recovery_C", "KALL_Recovery_R", "KALL_Contemporary_C", "KALL_Contemporary_R", "Savijoki_Background_C", "Savijoki_Background_R", "Savijoki_Recovery_C", "Savijoki_Recovery_R", "Savijoki_Contemporary_C", "Savijoki_Contemporary_R", "Siltapuro_Background_C", "Siltapuro_Background_R", "Siltapuro_Recovery_C", "Siltapuro_Recovery_R", "Siltapuro_Contemporary_C", "Siltapuro_Contemporary_R")

Het_Btrout_df$Site <- factor(Het_Btrout_df$Site, levels = sites_order)


custom_theme = theme(
  axis.text.x = element_text(size = 10, angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, face = "bold"),
  axis.text.y = element_text(size = 10),
  axis.title.y = element_text(size = 12),
  axis.title.x = element_blank(),
  axis.line.y = element_line(size = 0.5),
  legend.title = element_blank(),
  legend.text = element_text(size = 12),
  panel.grid = element_blank(),
  panel.background = element_blank(),
  plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 15, face="bold")
  )
hetlab.o = expression(italic("H")[o])
hetlab.e = expression(italic("H")[e])

ggplot(data = Het_Btrout_df, aes(x = Site, y = value, fill = color))+
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge", colour = "black")+
  scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0,0), limits = c(0,0.750), breaks = c(0, 0.10, 0.20, 0.30, 0.40, 0.50, 0.60))+
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("pink", "#bdbdbd"), labels = c(hetlab.o, hetlab.e))+
  ylab("Heterozygosity")+
  ggtitle("B.trout Heterozygosity")+
  custom_theme
